text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Kkr Real Estate Finance Trust Inc :
* KKR REAL ESTATE FINANCE TRUST INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* KKR REAL ESTATE FINANCE TRUST INC QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32‍​
* KKR REAL ESTATE FINANCE TRUST INC QTRLY CORE EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32‍​
* KKR REAL ESTATE FINANCE TRUST INC - BOOK VALUE PER SHARE OF COMMON STOCK WAS $19.73 AT DECEMBER 31, 2017
* KKR REAL ESTATE FINANCE TRUST INC QTRLY TOTAL NET INTEREST INCOME $19.5 MILLION VERSUS $8.3 MLN‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
